name: PicoClaw TS Package Scan
description: PicoClaw lightweight scan of tinyland-inc TypeScript packages for broken imports, missing types, and dead exports
process: List tinyland-inc repos with TypeScript as primary language
For each package: fetch tsconfig.json and check compiler options
Check for missing type declarations (*.d.ts files)
Scan for dead exports (exported but never imported by other packages)
Check for broken import paths referencing non-existent modules
